description:
An easy to follow and entertaining course for all new children's book authors.

You will learn secrets on how to create characters, tips on writing, do's and don't's for writing a good story and copyrights.

You will learn about illustrations and the technical aspects needed for artwork. This course will cover the pros and cons of self publishing and submitting your book to a publisher.

And finally how to sell and promote your book.

The course is in a fun animated style, with five lectures told in easy to understand, non- technical language. It is a one hour course.
title: Write, Illustrate and Publish Your Own Children's Book
